alert.note: Alert for Cass; Menard; Morgan; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 5:56PM CDT until March 31 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR WESTERN MENARD...NORTHWESTERN SANGAMON...SOUTHEASTERN CASS AND EASTERN MORGAN COUNTIES... At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tallula, or 15 miles northwest of Springfield, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Athens and Sherman. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 97 and 105. Interstate 72 between mile markers 66 and 93, and between mile markers 103 and 110. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and west central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
